meanings.definition: The quality or state of being abnormal.
meanings.sent1: The abnormality of his behavior raised concerns among his friends.
meanings.sent2: The doctor noted the abnormality in the test results.
meanings.sent3: Despite the abnormality of the situation, they managed to find humor in it.
meanings.sent4: Her unique perspective brought an abnormality to the discussion.
meanings.sent5: The abnormality of the painting made it stand out in the gallery.

meanings.definition: Something that is not normal or usual.
meanings.sent1: The researchers studied the abnormality in the genetic code.
meanings.sent2: In a world of conformity, his creativity was seen as an abnormality.
meanings.sent3: The abnormality of the situation made them laugh at the unexpected turn of events.
meanings.sent4: The sudden change in weather was an abnormality for this time of year.
meanings.sent5: The abnormality of her talent was evident in every performance.
